result.title: Very small stack size in GHC (Haskell)
result.content:
I found out that it's impossible to solve some problems like 513D2 - Constrained Tree using Haskell. Stack size is too small for such big restrictions. It's impossible to increase stack size in directly in code. On help page gcc runs like that gcc.exe -static -DONLINE_JUDGE -fno-asm -lm -s -Wl,--stack=268435456 -O2 -o {filename}.exe {file} (pay attention to --stack attribute) Does it possible to add in GHC +RTS -K268435456 (documentation) or something like that?

UPD: Just noticed the same request from user bjin in comments.
